#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main() {
    int t, n, i;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        int a[n];
        long long int sum = 0 , s = 0, min  = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            scanf("%d", &a[i]);
            sum += a[i];
            s += a[i];
            if (s > 0) {
                s = 0;
                } else if (min > s){
                            min = s;
                            }
            }
        sum += (-1)* 2 * min;
        printf("%lld\n",sum);
        }
    return 0;
    }
